messages.subject: help to track down sites, or to declare them gone
messages.msgSnippet: Two good links, links I liked, are gone now. One was the Texas unschooling link. http://www.texasunschoolers.com/ Is it just totally and forever gone, or
messages.messageBody:
Two good links, links I liked, are gone now.

One was the Texas unschooling link.
http://www.texasunschoolers.com/

Is it just totally and forever gone, or moved?

The other is/was this:
The Inspirit site has information on the book Christian Unschooling -
Growing Your Children in the Freedom of Christ, and there is a review
on a different site, with other useful links (links page on Christian
Unschooling) for Christians.

All gone. I tried google but only found book sales sites.

I can pull them off my pages if they're just plain gone.

What can I put on the local page for Texas though?

http://sandradodd.com/local



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
